headline: How to Watch Trump Georgia Rally: Time, Live Stream for GOP Campaign Event
author: Alexandra Hutzler
sentences: Trump encouraged the former U.S. senator to challenge Kemp after the governor refused to abide by Trump's request to overturn President Joe Biden's electoral victory in Georgia.
